title: John Harvey of Castle Semple
credit_line: J. Willis Dalzell Memorial Collection, gift of Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell
provenance_text:
Sir Henry Raeburn [1756-1823], Edinburgh, Scotland. Possible Sulley & Co., London, England by c. 1906 [1]; Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell (Mary Beer Dalzell) [1844-1929], Pittsburgh, PA until June 13, 1926; her gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1926.

Notes:
[1]. See references in curatorial file.
Record under review for update by CGK
